description.compact: The PRE_PACKAGE_INSTALL event occurs before a package is installed.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Installer\PackageEvent instance.

description.compact: The POST_PACKAGE_INSTALL event occurs after a package is installed.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Installer\PackageEvent instance.

description.compact: The PRE_PACKAGE_UPDATE event occurs before a package is updated.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Installer\PackageEvent instance.

description.compact: The POST_PACKAGE_UPDATE event occurs after a package is updated.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Installer\PackageEvent instance.

description.compact: The PRE_PACKAGE_UNINSTALL event occurs before a package has been uninstalled.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Installer\PackageEvent instance.

description.compact: The POST_PACKAGE_UNINSTALL event occurs after a package has been uninstalled.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Installer\PackageEvent instance.
